about_the_game:
Welcome to the SEX, BEACH & GIRLS⛱️ 💦, coastal romance of your dreams! Sizzling summer romance in a picturesque tropical town is inviting you to try the role of a ryoung heartthrob arriving on an exotic island seeking romance and lust!

You’ll be playing as a young guy with quite a hobby of visiting different places to seduce travelling hotties. Your mission? To conquer the hearts, of course - various girls are waiting for you to discover all of their sides!

The local resort town is your own little playground, offering many possibilities and random encounters. Visit the beach, local festivals, find some side hustles and earn a bit of money to shower your love interests with gifts and affection - balance your time and resources carefully to make sure you’re getting the most out of this vacation.

Meet our lovely cast you’re going to try to entice!
Angelica - spontaneous and lively woman with a passion for surprises, burgers, mustangs and octopuses. Quite a combination, and what to do with it is up to you.
Francoise - a sophisticated young lady who loves neoclassical art, seafood and astronomy. She enjoys wine, jazz and a nice science fiction fandom.
Gabriella is a sporty volleyball coach whose favourite saying should tell you all you need to know about her - “healthy abs means healthy spirit”.
Naoko brings a bit of east to the table - she has a deep connection to Japanese traditions and spirituality, bringing a touch of something magical to the story.
And finally, Noor - a big mystery to discover. Interactions with her bring pretty enigmatic vibes, all of the rest would be better to discover by yourself.

Will you find the right way to surprise Angelica, dive into Francoise's intricate world, prove your strength and dedication to Gabriella or maybe explore the mystical sides of Naoko and Noor? Everything’s up to you, as well as the outcome of your interactions and the overall ending of the story.

Explore themes of love, ambition, self-discovery and mystery while going through the immersive and emotionally engaging plot!

Features:
  • Charming coastal setting - enjoy the serene and romantic atmosphere of a resort town.
  • Fascinating adult content - experience a dozen steamy moments as hot as the sun there while you shape your summer love story! 🔞
  • A dating system in the form of a card game to make things even more engaging.
  • Participate in a local volleyball tournament!
  • Rich visuals - stunning 3D graphics crafted with love and attention to detail, designed to enhance the immersiveness of the story.
  • Choice matters! Decide whom to win over and how to do it and see what that results in - your actions shape the outcome.
  • Deep and well-thought characters - everyone’s unique, and everyone’s a personality here. Get to know them from every angle!
  • Intuitive gameplay, designed for maximum enjoyment - one hand would be enough.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains content not appropriate for all ages, or for viewing at work: sexual content, nudity. The game graphically depicts sex. All characters in the game are over the age of 18.

name: SEX, BEACH & GIRLS ⛱ 💦

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X compatible
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to a tropical island where sun, sand, and seduction await you! In the adult visual novel SEX, BEACH & GIRLS⛱️ 💦, you take on the role of the main character who arrives on an exotic island for the entire summer, seeking romantic adventures and beachside flings.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Romanian, Thai, Turkish, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
